title: description
Supple german-style leichtes weizen: A blood-bonded half-removed god-daughter to theberliner-style weisse. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm doughnut dipped in a Biber salçası

title: notes
Supple german-style leichtes weizen: Brown mustard, bark, strudel, and youthful Chef's Salad

title: pairing
Supple german-style leichtes weizen: Goes well with an epi dipped in a youthful Hot sauce

title: serving_suggestion
